title: The Velvet Chair
description: THE TREAT: Life with a sex demon is never boringJewel freed Randy from two centuries in a brass bed. Now he's her booty slave.THE TRICK: The Venus Machine will make you irresistible!A new age swindler is selling beauty via the "Venus Machine". Fraud cop Jewel is gonna bust him. So's Jewel's new partner, sexy con artist Clay. Randy and his mojo are along for the ride.THE TRUTH: Can the contraption bring attraction?Jewel gives the Venus Machine a test run to prove it's a fountain of flimflam. Something wild kicks into high gear. Powerful machine or power of suggestion?
author: Jennifer Stevenson
